title: Discussion Rooms
description: Library has introduced Discussion Rooms. Students need to study in groups can use these discussions rooms.

title: Study carrels
description: Library has added study carrels in its infrastructure for personalized studies purpose. The carrels are located at Library. These carrels are partitioned by glass fitting and charging point is also provided for the laptops.

title: Purchase of New books
description: Library has recently procured 547 books(Aug.2019) for students and faculty members.
